channel.title: [PI] Need help with creating custom monsters
channel.description: I just changed the IDs for the GWD NPCs, but they don't seem to work. The new IDs would spawn some random NPC instead of the GWD NPCs that they are suppose to spawn... any idea on why this occurs?

item.title: [PI] Need help with creating custom monsters
item.dc:creator: @PServ123 PServ123
item.description:
@PServ123 wrote:

well this has to do with adding npcs too such as corp and tds, so either way, i would need to know why the new ids wont work. i also like to know why things work or dont work, dont rlly like to leach.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Need help with creating custom monsters

item.title: [PI] Need help with creating custom monsters
item.dc:creator: @rangadanger7 rangadanger7
item.description:
@rangadanger7 wrote:

why did you change the id’s in the first place? most likely it IS the monster but since you only changed the id / name the client still shows models/gfx/anims of the previous monster. If i were you id just change id’s back? unless u have a good reason for them to be different.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Need help with creating custom monsters

item.title: [PI] Need help with creating custom monsters

i wish that was the case, but it isnt.
